snippet.title: Berzerk: Recharged - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Evil Otto is back and he more unstoppable than ever. Grab power-ups and take on these dizzying mazes full of taunting robots and a looming countdown clock. Fight like a robot solo or with a friend and avoid Evil Otto at all costs. 

Download Berzerk: Recharged today: https://link.atari.com/get-berzerk

Join the conversation on Discord: https://link.atari.com/discord

Follow Atari
Twitter: https://twitter.com/atari
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/atari
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/atari/
